snippet.title: Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator | OUT NOW 
Available here: https://heavy-cargo.aerosoft.com/
Transport oversized cargo in a variety of missions across a 175km² open world. Drive customisable, highly detailed trucks through dynamic weather and day and night. The official cooperation with Gruber Logistics allows you to get behind the wheel of real-life heavy cargo transports.

#truck #simulation #simulator #aerosoft #logistics #heavycargo
